trans-unit.source: Represents a control that allows the user to select a single item from a list that is displayed when the user clicks a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"></xref> and ToolStripDropDown replace and add functionality to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> control of previous versions, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"></xref>和 ToolStripDropDown 替换，并将功能添加到<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>的早期版本中，控件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>可以选择保留向后兼容性和将来使用。

trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: 处理对话框键。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box keys, such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 消息以处理对话框键，例如选项卡、 返回、 转义符，和箭头键在预处理期间调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 仅当调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>方法指示控件未在处理该键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey simply sends the character to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: ProcessDialogKey 只需将字符发送到父级的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 仅当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件，才能调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>这些值表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果键已由控件; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以使控件有机会处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 方法应确定控件是否处于处理助记键的状态，以及是否给定的字符是否表示助记键。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用此方法的实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>方法来确定给定的字符是否与助记键在控件的文本相匹配。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` This default implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A> method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 例如︰```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ```这种默认实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>方法只返回`false`以指示该控件具有没有助记键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字符已由控件; 处理作为助记键否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
